text: Curious George is an platform-adventure video game, based on cartoon of the same name. Developed by Monkey Bar Games and published by Namco. The game features 13 linear levels, which closely follow the plot of the movie. And each levels also that player can collect all bananas, and cutscence from the first movie. title: Curious George (video game)
